CustomField.formula: CASE(RecordType.Name, "Standard", "S", "Emergency Response", "E", "Funding Opportunity", "F", "Humanitarian", "H", "Grant", "G", "Legacy", "L", "End of Involvement", "X", "Construction", "C", "") & IF(DATEVALUE(CreatedDate) > DATEVALUE("2019-12-31"), RIGHT(TEXT(YEAR(DATEVALUE(CreatedDate))), 2), IF(RecordType.Name = "Grant", RIGHT(TEXT(YEAR(Start_Identification__c)), 2), RIGHT(TEXT(YEAR(DATEVALUE(CreatedDate))), 2) ) ) & "-" & Project_Autonumber__c
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Project ID is generated by the system..
CustomField.label: Project ID Text
